newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian Purneftegaz oil firm head now Rosneft VP.
newsitem.headline: Russian Purneftegaz oil firm head now Rosneft VP.

text.p: Russian state oil holding company Rosneft has appointed Viktor Ageyev, the former chief executive of its crude oil production unit Purneftegaz, vice-president, the new head of Purneftegaz said on Thursday.
Andrei Martirosov told Reuters he had replaced Ageyev as head of Purneftegaz after a Purneftegaz board meeting on Tuesday.
Purneftegaz would hold its annual general meeting on April 25, he said.
Purneftegaz, also known as AO Rosneft Purneftegaz, is the object of a struggle between Rosneft, which is being privatised, and Russian oil major NK SIDANKO.

The latest court ruling denied OAO Sibirsko-Dalnevostochnaya Neftyanaya Kompaniya's (SIDANKO's) appeal for control over the crude oil producer, effectively saying Rosneft could keep the prize production unit.
